Battery.comm: The battery has a long life and is replaceable.

cont.entity_a: The battery was bad and would not charge.
cont.entity_b: The battery wouldn't charge and the product constantly shuts off with movement.
The included headphones are not comfortable.

cont.entity_a: The screen contrast is awful, making it almost impossible to see if you have vision issues. The screen is hard to read outdoors, especially in sunlight. The screen is easily scratched, but a screen protector or case can be used. The screen contrast is low, making it difficult to read outside.
cont.entity_b: The display and menus are difficult to use.

cont.entity_a: The interface is lousy, mixing up album order when navigating in modes other than 'songs'. The user interface is simple, and it's easy to load music from a computer.
cont.entity_b: The user interface is very poor.

cont.entity_a: The sound quality is good, but the headphones provided are average.
cont.entity_b: The sound quality is not great for some MP3 songs.

Charging.comm: The battery connection became loose, requiring adjustment.

cont.entity_a: You need to connect it to a computer to charge it or delete songs. Requires USB connection for charging, which may not be convenient when traveling. The product requires a computer connection for charging and does not come with a separate charger.
cont.entity_b: Charges from USB, reducing battery waste.

cont.entity_a: Only one playlist can be created at a time.
The player is compact, sturdy, and performs well. The build quality is high and works extremely well.
cont.entity_b: The design is slim and lightweight, suitable for exercising.

cont.entity_a: The memory can be easily expanded with a microSD card.

Functionality.comm: The product has a radio feature.

cont.entity_a: It can record voice and radio, unlike an iPod. The product has a radio and voice recorder feature.
cont.entity_b: Recording from FM only makes WAV files, not MP3.

cont.entity_a: The player has a long battery life and is durable.
cont.entity_b: The player failed within a year due to a broken battery cover.

Software.comm: Music can be transferred without special software.

cont.entity_a: The software does not play tracks in the order they appear on the album. The firmware is weak, but it syncs easily with Windows Media Player. The player connects directly to a computer and does not require special software.
The product has a high quality/price ratio.
The equalizer resets whenever changing artist, affecting headphone performance.
cont.entity_b: The buttons are tiny and the rotary/push knob is difficult to use.
